column4: hey, this is gluonman under a different name. I changed all the sources in sources.list on the edgy box and it's working. I was able to update and install ntfs-3g. Now I'm not so sure how to use ntfs-3g to set read and write permissions to the external. Do you know?
glad you got it installed, but i don't know how to use it. when i installed linux, i never looked back at Windows or anything to do with it
alright. I'll just ask again for anyone to answer.
